Name: tasmocompiler
Overview:
TasmoCompiler is a simple web GUI which allows you to compile fantastic Tasmota firmware with your own settings
**IMPORTANT NOTE** You have to remember that all compilation is performed on Gitpod servers, so you have to decide if you want to put sensitive data like Wifi/MQTT credentials to Gitpod hands.
CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system
